page.title: 08Tristran Procter of Gretton
page.content: Tristran Procter lives with his wife at 4.Corby Rd Gretton which is half of a large stone building which has been renovated and altered often since 1697. Mr Procter is 73 years old and was born in Lancashire. He left school when he was 13 and worked in a cotton mill for 8s 5d a week. His next job was working underground in a coalmine as a pony driver.The pony would stay underground all year except for the two weeks of the annual holiday.They would then be retired after 14 years service and their blind retirement would be spent above ground.At 17 Mr Procter travelled from Bolton-Corby on a Foden Steamwagon with solid wheels taking 5 days.After numerous other jobs around the country he moved to Gretton in 1965 as quarry foreman at Wakeley pit for Stewart & Lloyd which became the British Steel Corporation.
